articles.title: "She’s ending Sorribes Tormo, Bouzkova on so many levels" - Tennis fans react to Miyu Kato's kind gesture towards ball girl despite disqualification - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Tennis fans reacted to Miyu Kato's gracious gesture of presenting a gift to the ball girl whom she accidentally hit, despite being disqualified from the women's doubles match.
